Name: A Large Quantity Of Mushrooms
About the game: ALQOM: A Large Quantity Of Mushrooms is an experimental game/experience, exploring the potential of Virtual Reality to create unique atmospheric experiences. Slow-paced exploration with puzzle elements. The mushrooms will take you to a dark, surreal world. Walk around, explore, discover hidden areas, experiences, secrets. Sit down, look around, take in the atmosphere, and experience a sense of mystery, wonder, ethereal beauty. Find strange items, play with them and experiment, see how they can alter your perception of the world and lead you to new places. Early access version is available for Oculus Rift with Touch controllers only . Other platforms and input methods are planned for later. Purchasing the early access grants you access to all future updates at no additional charge.
